block.p: An art entry in the Listings pages of Weekend on Friday about ''United Black Girls,'' a group show that closed at the Rush Arts Gallery in Chelsea on Saturday, omitted a co-curator and erroneously included another person as one. Derrick Adams was co-curator with Vanessa C. B. Riding; Courtney J. Martin contributed the introductory essay to the show but did not help put the show together.
